name: 李旻璁
objective:
This course aims to improve the understanding of students in computer simulation methods. Students will learn to re-examine their own research results in a different aspect using computational simulation. Students will need to formulate research tasks for their own research projects.

All courses will be recorded and documented in the Youtube Playlist:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL8heLgO8UqyPA-RAJ9h0a_ZOGmPVbvl_A
schedule:
1. Introduction of molecular/computer simulations in engineering and the tools for this course. (1 wk)
2. Computer programming (online course, 2wk) 
3. Exam for basic programming skills (1 wk)
4. Simulation workshop -- the friction problem (4 wks) | Introduction for modeling, force field, trajectory analysis, and visualization
5. Literature survey for computer simulation papers (1 wk)
6. Use open-source simulation packages for your research (1 wk)
7. Course project -- perform simulation for your own research topic (6 wk)
8. Formulate a simulation-based proposal (1 wk)
scorePolicy:
1. Exam for basic programming skills (20%)
2. Visualization for simulation workshop (20%)
3. Proposal part 1 -- literature survey (30%)
4. Proposal part 2 -- preliminary results (30%)

Class anticipation -- minus 10 points per absence
